item.description:
This is a members-only meeting which means you must have paid the full dues of $40.00 and signed the statement of ethics prior to the meeting to be able to attend. No visitors are allowed at this meeting because of confidentiality rules. Being a member of the meetup is not the same as being a member of the Innovators Resource Network.

Meeting agenda will be e-mailed separately when decided upon.

Note: it is always a good idea to rsvp "Yes" to meetup events. That way organizers can contact only the people who rsvp'ed with any updates or changes to the event, instead of emailing the whole list.
item.name: November Members-Only Meeting
